title: Is the accused Charlottesville's left-wing killer Ante Trump supported by Clinton, Soros?
subtitle: The driver who crossed a crowd of anti-protesters in Charlottesville immediately identified several right-hand sources as extreme leftist.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The driver of the car, who killed one person and injured more than a dozen others at the UNIT gathering in Charlottesville, Virginia, is a well-known "extremist cavalry" supported by Hillary Clinton and George Soros.
